short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have fun with your friends & colleagues with this extension. It will show dancing sheep when loading any webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have fun with your friends and/or colleagues with this extension. It will show dancing sheep when loading any webpage. The sheep will autmatically disappear after a few seconds.
